sentence: Gen. Eric Schmitt (R); Rep. Jim Jordan (R-Ohio); author James O’Keefe (“American Muckraker”).
title: Guests on Sunday talk shows: Rep. James Clyburn on CNN’s ‘State of the Union’

author: Red Voice Media
title: VA Governor Youngkin’s First Day, Signs Executive Orders Banning CRT And Investigating Loudon County Officials

sentence: Rep. Jim Jordan, R-Ohio, told Newsmax on Tuesday that conservatives have a lot of reasons to be confident in a red wave this November, but warned never to be overconfident.
author: Jeremy Frankel
title: Rep. Jordan to Newsmax: Be Confident of Red Wave, but Not Overconfident

sentence: The day after Glenn Youngkin won the Virginia governor’s race last November, a Wall Street Journal headline declared: “Youngkin Makes the GOP the Parents’ Party.” Representative Jim Jordan of Ohio exulted in this new party line on Twitter: “The Republican Party is the party of parents.” Polling data showed this new branding to be as misleading as the GOP’s framing of critical race theory.
author: Ibram X. Kendi
title: The Danger More Republicans Should Be Talking About

sentence: From The Atlantic: The day after Glenn Youngkin won the Virginia governor’s race last November, a Wall Street Journal headline declared: “Youngkin Makes the GOP the Parents’ Party.” Representative Jim Jordan of Ohio exulted in this new party line on Twitter: “The Republican Party is the party of parents.” Kendi is wrong here.
author: Sam Janney
title: ‘Kinda gives the game away here, no’? Ibram X. Kendi goes straight-up #BlueAnon ranting about white supremacist grooming and LOL
